original_title: Liverpool FC - Champions League Final & The Road To Istanbul
overview: Featuring the full Champions League Final, pre-match build up, highlights from all the games in the competition, interviews and the Victory parade!  The Final  Liverpool 3 - AC Milan 3  3-2 Penalties  The Road To Istanbul  Graz AK (A) 2-0  Graz AK (H) 0-1  Monaco (H) 2-0  Olympiakos (A) 0-1  Deportivo La Coruna (H) 0-0  Deportivo La Coruna (A) 1-0  Monaco (A) 0-1  Olympiakos (H) 3-1  Bayer Leverkusen (H) 3-1  Bayer Leverkusen (A) 3-1  Juventus (H) 2-1  Juventus (A) 0-0  Chelsea (A) 0-0  Chelsea (H) 1-0  AC Milan (A) 3-3 (3-2 Pen)
title: Liverpool FC - Champions League Final & The Road To Istanbul
